making an ICSP cable

08 Feb 2009
I'm a terrible amateur and it shows. Just look at how pathetic this cable looks.



Soldered some wires to a connecter I bought for 3 euros (!). Does it show that I can't solder worth crap ? And then fix everything together with my trusty gluegun.

And after all that work, the cable doesn't work! I can't believe it. Maybe I'm overlooking something...
